objects.text:
Spaciously stylish with ample storage
Gold-tone hardware & chain charm
Durable synthetic leather material
Medium size: perfect for everyday

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner centers around a premium tote bag product image ("product_image") complemented by a minimalist, layered background with soft borders and curved golden accents. The headline ("heading") is bold and dark, making a strong statement near the top-left, followed by a stylish subheading ("subheading") in a muted, refined brown. A thin decorative line ("decorative") below the title separates it from the body text ("description"), which provides succinct product features in a legible serif font. A bold price tag ("price") anchors the design, alongside a call-to-action button ("cta_background") with inviting contrast text ("cta") that draws attention. The layout balances modern design with warm tones that appeal to a fashion-forward demographic.

**Color Palette**:
- Creamy Beige: `#F5E9DE` (background)
- Deep Brown: `#5D4037` (main text, price)
- Warm Taupe: `#A67B5B` (buttons, subheading)
- Gold: `#D4AF37` (accents, lines, ornamental strokes)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (text over button and overlay shapes)
product_color: The product image displays a sophisticated handbag in a warm, muted camel brown (#A46B45), which forms the primary color of the palette. This color exudes elegance and can be paired with neutral backgrounds for a minimalist ad banner. The bag features gold-tone metallic hardware (#D4AF37) used for the clasps, chains, and brand name, adding luxury and acting as eye-catching highlights. The subtle grain texture further blends the base brown with soft shadows of deeper brown (#8B5E3C), creating depth and richness. A clean soft white (#F8F8F8) background would amplify the brown and gold contrasts in an advertisement.
